com.courseApp.reviewService

Class ReviewRequestProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.courseApp.reviewService.ReviewRequestProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UseQueryRecommendationInfo, UseQueryReview, UseUpdateReview

    public class ReviewRequestProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements UseQueryReview, UseUpdateReview, UseQueryRecommendationInfo
    Review Request Processor use case for realizing review data query and IO.

    • Method Detail

      • queryCourseReviewSummary

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryCourseReviewSummary(java.lang.String courseCode)
        Check the existence of course review, and then return the course review summary map, or null if the course review is not in the database.

        The summary map should be: courseCode: String courseDifficultyRate: String courseGeneralRate: String

        Specified by:
        queryCourseReviewSummary in interface UseQueryReview
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code w/o section flag
        Returns:
        CourseReview summary map if targeted course in the database, otherwise, null

      • queryInstReviewSummary

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryInstReviewSummary(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                                               java.lang.String instName)
        Check the existence of the instructor review, and then return the instructor review summary map, or null if the instructor entity is not in the database

        The summary map should be: instructorName: String instGeneralRate: String instDifficultyRate: String

        Specified by:
        queryInstReviewSummary in interface UseQueryReview
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code w/o section flag
        instName - Instructor name
        Returns:
        InstReview summary map if targeted instructor is in the database, otherwise, null

      • queryUserReview

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryUserReview(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                                        java.lang.String instName,
                                                                        java.lang.String username)
        Check the existence of the user review, and then return the user review summary map, or null if the instructor entity is not in the database The summary map should be: username: String generalRate: String difficultyRate: String reviewString: String
        Specified by:
        queryUserReview in interface UseQueryReview
        Parameters:
        courseCode - course code w/o section flag
        instName - Instructor name
        username - username
        Returns:
        UserReview summary map if targeted user review is in the database, otherwise, null

      • insertOneUserReview

        public boolean insertOneUserReview(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                   java.lang.String instName,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   double generalRate,
                                   double difficultyRate,
                                   double recommendationRate,
                                   java.lang.String reviewString)
        Insert one user review entity to targeted course and instructor. Note that the recommendation rate will be updated.
        Specified by:
        insertOneUserReview in interface UseUpdateReview
        Parameters:
        courseCode - courseCode targeted course
        instName - instName targeted instructor
        username - username
        generalRate - given general rate
        difficultyRate - given difficulty rate
        recommendationRate - given recommendation rate
        reviewString - given review
        Returns:
        true iff the insertion is successful

      • deleteOneUserReview

        public boolean deleteOneUserReview(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                   java.lang.String instName,
                                   java.lang.String username)
        Delete one user review entity to targeted course and instructor. Note that the reviews under one instructor should have unique username.
        Specified by:
        deleteOneUserReview in interface UseUpdateReview
        Parameters:
        courseCode - targeted course
        instName - targeted instructor
        username - username of the user review to be deleted
        Returns:
        true iff the deletion is successful
